channel.title: KDE is too heavy
channel.description:
Hello,
I didn't find any contact form to contact whonix team.
I wanted just to say that KDE is awfully heavy, uses to much RAM for nothing. I don't understand this choice.
Other thing I don't understand how to find a web browser. Thus I have no time to go further (especially I don't want to waste time for an OS with KDE), I'm searching something else!

item.title: KDE is too heavy
item.dc:creator: virtualbox1
item.description:
Have you tried install LXDE ? it feels faster for me…

Read full topic

I didn’t find any contact form to contact whonix team.

leonotis:

I wanted just to say that KDE is awfully heavy, uses to much RAM for nothing. I don’t understand this choice.

Whonix

Other Desktop Environments

How to use Other Desktop Environments other than KDE with Whonix. Current situation. Risks. Future.

leonotis:

Other thing I don’t understand how to find a web browser.

Whonix

Tor Browser

Using Tor Browser in Whonix. Anonymity vs Pseudonymity, HTTPS Everywhere, Torbutton, Protection against dangerous JavaScript, NoScript, Tips, Update T...

Answers to most questions can be found in the Documentation or here in the Whonix forums by using the search engine in the upper right hand corner of your screen. If you can not find and answer you are more than welcome to ask here.
